attr.title: Forager
attr.desc:
Forager is a 2D open world game inspired by exploration, farming and crafting games such as Stardew Valley, Terraria & Zelda!

Note: Only the Steam Version works. The Linux version is 2.0.4 which is not as up to date as the Windows version.
attr.inst:
Purchase Forager from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/751780/Forager/

Download the linux version:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 751780 751783 3324194938480079153 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy all files from /assets to /ports/forager/gamedata
